#summary memcached related tools

= Introduction =

This page the place to go for all things related memcached tools.  Not much here now, but more to come. If have something you want to add, drop a line to the mailing list and we'll get it here.

= List of Interesting Memcached Tools =

- Wireshark now understands memcached binary protocol. Get at wireshark [http://www.wireshark.org/download/automated]

-The gear6 folks have created a plugin for wireshark that understands the textual protocol. Get it that at [http://dev.gear6.com/downloads/wireshark-memcache-protocol-dissector]
